classDescription: Prerequisite: Grade of “B” or better in 8th grade Social science and a desire to pursue other AP classes offered by the History/Social Science Department.

classDescription: Prerequisite: Grade of an A in English 1 and desire to work at a college level. HSS grade of an A recommended.

subject: history
classDescription: Prerequisite: Grade of A in previous World History class or B or higher in AP European History. It is recommended that this grade be earned in a year long course not in a summer school course.

className: AP Government and Politics of the United States
subject: history
classDescription: Prerequisite: Grade of A in previous American History class or B or higher in AP United States History. It is recommended that this grade be earned in a year long course not in a summer school course.

classDescription: Prerequisite: Open to students in grade 12 only. Some experience in an honors or AP level science or history course recommended

subject: history
classDescription: Prerequisite: Successful completion of an AP English or Social Science class with a grade of a B or higher. For students in the class of 2021 and beyond, desire to enroll in the second course in this sequence, AP Research in academic year 2021-22.
